## IMultiCallControl.resume() method

Resumes the current call when on hold.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resume(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

If a call is not active, or if no call is on hold.

## Remarks

You can only change the hold state while the device is in an active call.
